      • makeWbRecord

        protected WbTextRecord makeWbRecord(int docID,
                        WarcRecord warcRecord)
        Given a WARC record instance, return an equivalent WbTextRecord instance.
        Parameters:
        docID - Document ID to be passed into the resulting WbTextRecord.
        warcRecord - The WARC record instance to be converted.
        Returns:
        A WbTextRecord that is usable in a WebStream.
